page.title: 05SOCIAL CONCERN
page.content: THE MOST NOTEWORTHY ACHIEVEMENT OF THE COUNCIL WAS THE ISSUE OF THE CLOSURE OF THE SCHOOL. IT WAS SAFED FROM CLOSURE MAINLY WE BELIEVE ,BY THE EEFORTS OF THE COMMUNITY COUNCIL .HAD THEY NOT BEEN THERE ,OPPOSITION TO THE CLOSURE WOULD NOT HAVE BEEN SO EASILY MOBILIZED, NOR NEARLY SO EFFECTIVE.THE SCHOOL NOW SEEMS TO BE THRIVING . OTHER ISSUES INCLUDE ,THE PATHWAYS UP TO DOWNFIELD, IMPROVED STREET LIGHTING,RESURFACING OF THE ROAD TO THE PLAYING PARK AT CRAIGMILLS AND PROVISION OF CAR PARKING FACILITIES AT BRIDGEFOOT COTTAGES. THE COUNCIL ALSO ACTS AS A SOCIAL FOCUS FOR THE COMMUNITY .THERE ARE REGULAR SOCIAL EVENTS , AT LEAST ANNUALLY RUN BY THE COUNCIL.
